<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_ebh_bill_report_competitors_aoa</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Insert child record</name><order>1200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var marketShareReport = new GlideRecord('x_ebh_bill_report_market_share_csv');
    marketShareReport.addQuery('u_mrkt_share_sys_id', current.bill_report_sys_id);
    marketShareReport.query();

    while (marketShareReport.next()) {
		
		var currentcomp= current.competitor.toString();
		
		gs.log("currentcomp:"+currentcomp);

       // marketShareReport.comp_aoa = current.competitor_aoa_count;

     }

//         marketShareReport.insert();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mohammad.raza@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-25 18:42:19</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>04074bb2c3343d1011971d4ce001312d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Insert child record</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Market Share and AOA Collection" source="x_ebh_bill_report">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Market Share and AOA Collection">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_04074bb2c3343d1011971d4ce001312d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mohammad.raza@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-28 13:00:47</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=04074bb2c3343d1011971d4ce001312d"/></record_update>
